title: Revenger
short_cast: Bruce Khan, Park Hee-soon, Yoon Jin-seo, Kim In-kwon, Kim Na-yeon, Park Chul-min, Jeon Soo-jin, Kim Jae-hyun, Choi Je-heon
cast: Bruce Khan, Park Hee-soon, Yoon Jin-seo, Kim In-kwon, Kim Na-yeon, Park Chul-min, Jeon Soo-jin, Kim Jae-hyun, Choi Je-heon
genre: Korean, Martial Arts Movies, Action & Adventure
desc: Hell-bent on avenging the murder of his family, a former detective infiltrates a remote island that serves as a prison for vicious death row criminals.
